= Remote Operation via Console =
 # Remote Desktop into OLDHP-LAPTOP-UBUNTU
 # Open a Terminal
 # Enter the following:
{{{
sudo chmod 0777 /dev/ttyUSB0
}}}
 # Open a Putty Session
 # Load: icaruspc-console and Open
 # Press Enter

== HDMI Output ==
{{{
sudo nano /etc/X11/xorg.conf
"Option "fbdev" "/dev/fb6"
}}}

== Start Xtion Camera ==
 # Open a New Terminal and enter
{{{
roscore
}}}
 # Open a New Terminal and enter
{{{
cd ~/catkin_ws
source ./devel/setup.bash
rosrun xtionsender sender
}}}

== To Compile Xtion Camera Code ==
 # Open a New Terminal and enter
{{{
cd ~/catkin_ws
catkin_make
}}}
